instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run 'yarn add framer-motion recharts clsx tailwind-merge' immediately.
FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'src/index.css' at the very top.
TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the new font families (Manrope, Plus Jakarta Sans, JetBrains Mono) and the 'brand' color extension.
ICONS: Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. Do not use emojis.
LAYOUT: For the Dashboard, create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a fixed sidebar and scrollable main content area.
THEME: Use 'Light Mode' for the Dashboard (clean, data-focused) and 'Dark Mode' for the Landing Page (tech, futuristic).
CHARTS: Use 'recharts' for the analytics. Keep them simple (LineChart for growth, BarChart for engagement).
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' font. Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body and 'Manrope' for headings.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
